forecasts.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then areas of fog and a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. South wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
